description: Main front-end source code for the Flutter-based Memory Match game, including UI components, game state management, and theme configuration.

classes.name: MemoryGameApp
classes.description: The main application widget that sets theme and home screen.

classes.name: MemoryCard
classes.description: Model representing a memory game card with properties like id, icon, flipped state, and matched state.

classes.name: MemoryGameScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget managing the game logic, UI, and interactions.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the app, runs the MemoryGameApp widget.

methods.name: _buildColorScheme
methods.description: Constructs a custom color scheme for the app theme.

methods.name: _crossAxisCountForWidth
methods.description: Determines grid column count based on screen width for responsive layout.

methods.name: _buildDeck
methods.description: Creates and shuffles the deck of memory cards.

methods.name: _startTimerIfNeeded
methods.description: Starts the game timer if not already running.

methods.name: _resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state, builds a new deck, and restarts the timer.

methods.name: _onCardTap
methods.description: Handles logic when a card is tapped, including matching logic and animations.

methods.name: _formatTime
methods.description: Formats elapsed time into MM:SS string.

methods.name: _restartWithCurrentLayout
methods.description: Restarts the game maintaining current grid layout and size.
